eu_initiatives: As a member of COCERAL, (European association representing the trade in cereals, rice, feedstuffs, oilseeds, olive oil, oils and fats and agrosupply) we participate in EU Consulting and Expert groups.
organisation_name: Association Hellenique des Commercants  et Exportareurs de cereales et d' aliments de betail (SEEDYZ)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Promoting cereals, by-products and feedstuff commerce  
both in the national and international markets. 
 
The continuous improvement of the local market 
organization in grains, feedstuff and by-products 
trading.
